title: [K-12] Self-Assessment-Driven Language Learning Competency Strengthening Project

context.additional_context: Self-assessment and reflective journaling via smartphone apps, collaborative language task performance through Problem-Based Learning (PBL).

learning_goals: Learners can analyze their language learning strategies and achievements by writing reflective journals twice weekly.
Learners can revise drafts of language projects at least twice based on peer feedback.
Learners can diagnose language proficiency using at least three self-assessment tools and develop improvement plans.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
